channel.title: Building in Public
channel.description: A non-technical founder building audio & media tech with AI

item.title: Building Airtable + AWS Integrations That Actually Work
item.description: Why the webhook pattern beats synchronous calls and Airtable API updates. After building five production microservices, here's what actually works—including when to use Airtable AI vs AWS Bedrock, and how to debug across the stack.
item.dc:creator: Neel Ketkar

item.title: Why I Started with Whisper Locally (Before Moving to the Cloud)
item.description: How running OpenAI Whisper locally taught me about transcription, FFmpeg, Python dependencies, and system architecture—before I eventually moved to cloud APIs for good reason.
item.dc:creator: Neel Ketkar

item.title: Building This Blog with Claude Code: Why I Skipped WordPress
item.description: How I built a custom static blog in hours instead of wrestling with WordPress. From contemporary serif design to bold TV Guide aesthetic—complete design evolution, comprehensive SEO/GEO optimization, and zero hosting costs. All through conversation with an AI coding assistant.
item.dc:creator: Neel Ketkar

item.title: Building Cronkiter: A Vintage Audio Transformer in Under 2 Hours
item.description: From Reddit inspiration to production deployment: How I built a browser-based vintage audio tool with Claude Code, learned about Web Audio API, and shipped it live with GoatCounter analytics and full SEO optimization—all in about 90 minutes.
item.dc:creator: Neel Ketkar

item.title: Deploying FFmpeg to AWS Lambda: A Battle-Tested Guide
item.description: How I learned to deploy FFmpeg in serverless environments after weeks of architecture mismatches and "exec format error" messages. From Lambda Layers to ECS Fargate, here's what actually works—and how to guide your AI coding assistants to get it right.
item.dc:creator: Neel Ketkar
